films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.product-name: Sony Extra Bass Portable bluetooth speaker
films.description: An inventor comes up with a time machine, but must prevent its abuse at the hands of an evil C.E.O.
A young man meets a farm girl who is actually a witch.
The Martians kidnap Santa Claus because there is nobody on Mars to give their children presents.

films.product-name: Betalife Ultra Comfy Memory Foam Mattress
films.description: A young man is transformed into a hideous 'moon beast' due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.
A woman seeks revenge on her former lover, who owns a skydiving business.
On an isolated island, a small group of people are terrorized by giant voracious shrews in the midst of a hurricane.
A saboteur posing as a scientist strives to destroy the world's first space station.
Giant spiders from another dimension invade Wisconsin.
A group of swingin' teens take time out from having fun in the sun to try to foil a group of crooks searching for a stolen scroll.
A series of murders in Michigan lead an American secret agent to Amsterdam, where he uncovers a plot to imperil the world with a potent new drug.
A stock car driver goes undercover as the wheel man for a motorcycle gang.
International man of mystery Diabolik and his lover pull off heist after heist, all while European cops led by Inspector Ginko and envious mobsters led by Ralph Valmont are closing in on them.
Delinquent teen-agers ingest a substance and grow thirty feet tall, then proceed to take over a small town.
